item.title: Advancing Tool-Augmented Large Language Models: Integrating Insights from Errors in Inference Trees
item.description: TP-LLaMA boosts tool-augmented LLMs by optimizing inference trajectories using preference learning from both successful and failed attempts, achieving superior performance and efficiency.

item.title: DiffuLT: Diffusion for Long-tail Recognition Without External Knowledge
item.description: DiffuLT uses a novel diffusion model to generate balanced training data from imbalanced datasets, achieving state-of-the-art results in long-tailed image recognition without external knowledge.

item.title: Provably Efficient Reinforcement Learning with Multinomial Logit Function Approximation
item.description: This paper presents novel RL algorithms using multinomial logit function approximation, achieving O(1) computation and storage while nearly closing the regret gap with linear methods.
